title: Did not recieve icon yet
body: Umm I gifted rakan too friend with ip before april 26 and did not get my icon I'm sad atm

replies.body: No worries! The Gift of Magic icons are still being given out, and should all be given out over the next two weeks. If you don't have yours by May 10th, shoot us a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we can take a look!

according to the page that announced the event, it takes upto TWO weeks after the event finishes to be give out the icons, so if you have not received yours two weeks AFTER the end date, then I would suggest submitting a ticket here:  https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new
